name: Drop-in: A Place to Play
description: Come play with your young ones as they CRAWL, CLIMB, and EXPLORE our indoor playground like environment! This is a parent/caregiver participation activity. No drop-offs allowed.
fullDescription: Come play with your young ones as they CRAWL, CLIMB, and EXPLORE our indoor playground like environment! This is a parent/caregiver participation activity. No drop-offs allowed.
whatTheyOffer: Come play with your young ones as they CRAWL, CLIMB, and EXPLORE our indoor playground like environment! This is a parent/caregiver participation activity. No drop-offs allowed.
howToGetIt: If this is a Drop-In program, please go to the meeting location at the activity start time.
